meta_title: What Is MRO? Definition, Examples, and Strategic Value
meta_description: MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Operations) encompasses the supplies and activities needed to keep a business running. Understand its role in industrial efficiency.
title: What Is MRO?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is MRO?

image_prompt: A high-resolution, professional photo of a modern, well-organized industrial storeroom. In the foreground, a diverse pair of maintenance professionals (one male, one female) wearing high-visibility vests and hard hats are looking at a digital tablet together. In the background, neatly labeled industrial shelving units hold various MRO supplies like motors, gearboxes, and safety equipment. The lighting is bright and clean, conveying a sense of high-tech efficiency and order. No text.
